thread.title: Toronto van attack suspect left 'cryptic message'

title: Toronto van attack suspect left 'cryptic message'
text:
Toronto van attack suspect left 'cryptic message' Tuesday, April 24, 2018 - 01:58 
Suspect Alek Minassian, accused of plowing a rental van into pedestrians on a crowded Toronto sidewalk, left a 'cryptic message' on social media before his attack which may provide clues to a motive.   
Suspect Alek Minassian, accused of plowing a rental van into pedestrians on a crowded Toronto sidewalk, left a 'cryptic message' on social media before his attack which may provide clues to a motive.  //reut.rs/2FcnI4I
